comment._content: Is this the bridge at Guildford?

comment._content: I think it must be the Guildford Bridge as it goes over the Helena River.  Pity there are no dates to these photos.

comment.author: 93264774@N03
comment._content:
No not the Guildford Bridge.This is over the Helena River between Hazlemere and Midland.
It's still still there only smaller.
